Everyone has the opportunity to win points, even if it means that player might make fewer points than other players.  Well, if you are paying for the highest membership, goldies make 3x as many points as bronzies, and 1.5x as many points as silver members.  These points will be able to be converted into member benefits, discounts for purchasing merchandise, quickmatch prioritization for positions, and more coming soon!

Every player with gold tier membership has the opportunity to participate in joining an event using all the following methods available.   You may join a quickmatch, create your own event, join an existing event that you may select, and you may of course join any suggested event on the suggested events livefeed.  All gold members may invite friends to their events, providing a way for bronzies to participate like a gold.  Manual event entry and scheduling future events are limited to just silver and gold members.  You may take priority over bronzies and silvers when selecting a position that no longer has any more available positions given the rules of the sport you are playing.  No one can take your position away.  All gold members can utilize all the matchmatching preferences available using quickmatch mode including: joining an event based upon facility and location reviews, etc.

As a gold member, you will be able to view all the reviews people have created of you.  Additionally, you will be able to view your own player statistics.  As a paying member, say goodbye to annoying ads!
